variable.name: MATCHID
variable.comment: Unique number for each matched set that includes 1 case and at least 1 control

variable.name: PR5YR
variable.description: Five year predicted breast cancer risk

variable.name: LCIS
variable.description: History of LCIS [lobular carcinoma in situ] at entry

variable.name: ATYPH
variable.description: History of atypical hyperplasia at entry

variable.name: NBREL
variable.description: Number of first-degree relatives with breast cancer

variable.name: TIME
variable.comment: Difference between date of randomization and date of breast cancer for cases and date of last follow-up at risk for controls. Time interval is calculated to the nearest 10th of a month

variable.name: TOFFTRT
variable.comment: Difference between date of randomization and the last date the participant went off therapy or the date of last follow-up (if the patient did not go off therapy). Time interval is calculated to the nearest 10th of a month

variable.name: SMOKE
variable.description: Smoker at time entered on study

variable.name: HFS
variable.comment: Highest severity reported during 66 months of follow-up. Based on self-report. Hot flashes were scaled as the response on a self-administered questionnaire to "What was the extent to which you have had a problem within the last four weeks?"

variable.name: FluoAtEntry
variable.description: Fluoxetine use at time of entry

variable.name: FluoAfterEntryTime
variable.description: Time to start of fluoxetine use
variable.comment: Difference between date of randomization and start date of fluoxetine use. Missing if did not start after entry. Time interval is expressed as the number of months and is calculated to the nearest 10th of a month.

variable.name: ParoAtEntry
variable.description: Paroxetine use at time of entry

variable.name: ParoAfterEntryTime
variable.comment: Difference between date of randomization and start date of paroxetine use. Missing if did not start after entry. Time interval is expressed as the number of months and is calculated to the nearest 10th of a month.

variable.name: SertAtEntry
variable.description: Sertraline use at time of entry

variable.name: SertAfterEntryTime
variable.description: Time to start of Sertraline Use
variable.comment: Difference between date of randomization and start date of Sertraline use. Missing if did not start after entry. Time interval is expressed as the number of months and is calculated to the nearest 10th of a month.

variable.name: BuprAtEntry
variable.description: Buproprion use at time of entry
variable.comment: Wellbutrin, Zyban, Prolev, Quomem, Aplenzin, Budeprion

variable.name: BuprAfterEntryTime
variable.description: Time to start of Buproprion Use
variable.comment: Difference between date of randomization and start date of Buproprion use. Missing if did not start after entry. Time interval is expressed as the number of months and is calculated to the nearest 10th of a month.

variable.name: CimeAtEntry
variable.description: Cimetidine use at time of entry

variable.name: CimeAfterEntryTime
variable.description: Time to start of cimetidine use
variable.comment: Difference between date of randomization and start date of Cimetidine use. Missing if did not start after entry. Time interval is expressed as the number of months and is calculated to the nearest 10th of a month.

variable.name: DoxeAtEntry
variable.description: Doxepin use at time of entry

variable.name: DoxeAfterEntryTime
variable.description: Time to start of doxepin use
variable.comment: Difference between date of randomization and start date of Doxepin use. Missing if did not start after entry. Time interval is expressed as the number of months and is calculated to the nearest 10th of a month.

variable.name: TiclAtEntry
variable.description: Ticlopidine use at time of entry

variable.name: TiclAfterEntry
variable.description: Ticlopidine use after time of entry

variable.name: TiclAfterEntryTime
variable.description: Time to start of ticlopine use
variable.comment: Difference between date of randomization and start date of Ticlopidine use. Missing if did not start after entry. Time interval is expressed as the number of months and is calculated to the nearest 10th of a month.

variable.name: CitaAtEntry
variable.description: Citalopram use at time of entry

variable.name: CitaAfterEntryTime
variable.comment: Difference between date of randomization and start date of citalopram use. Missing if did not start after entry. Time interval is expressed as the number of months and is calculated to the nearest 10th of a month.

variable.name: genotype
variable.comment: "genotype" - See CYP2D6_Metablizer.docUM=ultra metabolizer, EM=extensive metabolizer, IM=intermediate metabolizer, PM=poor metabolizer.

variable.name: Metabolizer
variable.comment: Based on CYP2D6 genotype and CYP2D6 inhibitor status.
